description: Responsive and user friendly YouTube viewer! Changes by Google on the server side sometimes break functions of the app, but fixes are quickly rolled out by the development team.
summary: Snap and AppImage version working good on Ubuntu!

description: HOW MANY DAYS DOES IT TAKE FOR SNAP TO UPDATE THE APP
Works well on mobile (Droidian) and desktop (Debian 12).
its a perfect app with lots of issues. this thing keeps happening where it flicker scrolls up and down and idk how to fix otherwise 10/10 better than og app

bad - glich and does no play video.
good - except bad all good.

description: Shows multiple errors, IndiviousAPI seems to be doesn't working anymore. Can't watch any video.

I am using this on Steam Deck. I enjoy no ads; could just as well watch Utube on Brave more often.  I keep getting this error - Error: Failed to extract n-token decipher algorithm.  And screen flickering or the video is just off screen.   Sometimes I have to remove it and reinstall and that helps.

I love using extensions to quickly change basic video settings like brightness, color, contrast, etc. I watch a lot of youtube at night, and the ability to adjust brightness on the fly would be GREAT!
summary: Works good, wish it had video settings

description:
Say goodbye to tedious Google Account and their tracking, yet still subscribe to your favorite channels! LIVE and Shorts are included too. 

Great!
summary: The #1 free as in freedom alternative for browsing YouTube

description: BEST FREE OPENSOURCE APP ON THE PLANET

flatpak wayland and display scalling is just pure agony. no way of changing mouse cursor size? when mouse moved on to freetube the scale of the pointer is 1/12. I can't see.

Otherwise, the ui is clunky but lets you watch videos and see comments, uses electron which is a big thumbs down. But it works and there are no ads
summary: it works but mouse cursor wayland needs to be fixed

description: Private viewing, no adverts, and all in a user friendly well designed piece of software. Whats not to love!
Works well full screen in gaming mode on Steam Deck after adding to Steam as non-Steam game. The ability to bookmark would be nice if possible. Thanks FreeTube!
Perfect solution for youtube on my deck!

dope just constimize it from setting the logo that appers in middle while using other then that it's great and hope where would be a option to remove title while in full screen and the down part as well it's kind of anaying
Been using it for a few months to listen to music while gaming, never encountered any issues.
Seems broken with electron visual elements includfing buttons and button text not showing up correctly or in the right place
This is a solid app, highly recommnd.. Hat off to the devs.
I like it very much. Thank you developer for making this application

For those who enjoy the Youtube experience but don't enjoy being tracked or being forced to watch ads, this is the best desktop alternative, bar none, and perhaps the best app period. Chiefly, it is the only alternative to Youtube that I know of where your subscriptions are never transmitted over a network (possibly except Newpipe, but that's Android anyway). There's even an option in Freetube's settings to force all of Freetube's network traffic through the Tor network.

Along with that, Preston has been personable, intelligent, kind, and responsive to Freetube's users' issues and requests. I can't think of anything more that one could want out of a program.
summary: One of the best apps I know

description: Easy to switch over subscriptions, but cannot switch over playlists it seems. FreeTube seems linked to the browser I started using it with, and if I use Brave browser, FreeTube won't open automatically(it would if I opened it manually, I guess). But, I don't always want it open.

Been using it for almost 3 months now. No adds. Clean interface. 
Easy to backup your subscriptions and import it to another distro.
Thank you for this gem! :D
I love the ability to do a local subscription without requiring a youtube account. Fantastic idea and nicely implemented!

Nice design overall but useless without actual account sign-in. The videos load with a long delay and setting the video quality is not accessible until the video loads and plays. So, it's for anonymous browsing, not practial usage.
summary: No account access and slow to load videos

description: i use everyday
Clean design, accurate filtering
There is no support for wayland fractional scaling, means you have blurry rendering in the whole application. sad :|

When I subscribe to a channel, upon restart of Freetube the channel is no longer part of my Subscriptions. This is true whether I subsribe directly, of if I import NewPipe subscriptions. It's true of both the Flatpak, and the .deb file install.

So far really liking this app, clean interface and nice subscription setup. My only gripe is that my VPN is set to block all google websites when it's turned on, and when it's on, the videos don't load. This doesn't happen with invidio.us, so I'll just stick with invidio.us for now. Great app, I just wish it didn't have this issue (I'm aware this is a me issue, not a FreeTube issue)
summary: Great app, with a few issues

description: it said blablablabla how das it work
Nice companion app for NewPipe, fully cover my need in youtube.

This is a far better way to have a YouTube experience. I'm not interested in using web browsers as I did in the past. I only watch a few YouTube channels now, since I'm not interested in fake news mainstream media. I found out who can't be trusted and now I only have a few channels to watch. Works for me. CNN, MSNBC, NBC, ABC, and Fox News are all dead to me!
summary: I love this! Gets the job done

description: Like this app and no need to use Incognito tab

FreeTube is an amazing app to replace using a web browser to watch youtube videos. It allows viewing comments, changing play speed (0.25x - 3x), subscriptions, playlists, and has light/dark themes, and allows custom accent colors for buttons. And the best part is that is protects your privacy from google's prying eyes.

One feature that would be a nice addition, though, would be if you could create a queue of videos all at once, kind of like a temporary playlist, or if you could have tabs like in a web browser. I like to queue up a few videos at a time to listen to while working, and itd be nice not to have to find a new video each time one ends. Anything else I could ask of the app, though, it does.
app worked for a while but now i cant click anyhting on it
Gets better with time, well maintained... Thank you for that dev
No ads, no stuid video suggestions, local subscription, no cookie questions. I never want to use the browser for youtube again!

Other than that it is okay. And it's not private if you don't switch to invidious since this app directly connects to Youtube. If we consider how slow invidious is, it's not for privacy minded folks. Good app though.
It's good. Since I've installed this I've never used one from the browser. I absolutely love the design and the philosophy behind it. Good job.
summary: Needs more improvement and frequent updates

description: NO ADS, NO PAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Look no further i have tried them all. This is the best native youtube player on linux.

Looks like a great app for the desktop.
On the Pinephone the keyboard does not
pop up. This means searching for videos
is essentially impossible.
When this gets proper playlists, I'll give it 5 stars. Only a few youtube functions are missing, and I honestly did not expect it to be as full feature as it is. looking forward to future development
keyboard doesnt popup in app.
Please add a keyboard . No keyboard on pinphone, manjaro, kde plasma neon. thx
summary: Pinephone Manjaro kde neon... no keyboard

description: Amazing app! Actively in development! A very big thank you for the developers!

works decent on the Pinephone. For the ones stating the keyboard will not come up, that is a problem with KDE/Plasma. Running phosh will fix the issue and is a better experiance in general. It wpuld be nice to have a gtk app for YouTube.
Thank you for this amazing app!
summary: A much needed alternative to watching on youtube itself

description: Awesome project. No issues at all.
summary: As close to NewPipe as you can get on Linux! Great app!

description: Just perfect. Thank you for making this app.
Good enough on PinePhone with ~85% scaling and list view.
summary: Good app for private youtube experience

description: Better than the real deal. The app functions and looks better than the website. No ads, no tracking, and you can create a list, just as if you had a youtube account. Minus being able to leave comments. But I do not have a google account so thats just fine by me. Also you can apparently download videos. This thing is loaded with quality features. Havent tried it yet but I dont really need that particular function personally. Anything more is just a bonus.
summary: Brilliant. Simply brilliant. 10 out of 5 stars

description:
App looks good, but the keyboard
does not pop up on the PinePhone
:(
Awsome alternative to use youtube!
This app is essential for anybody who can't quite give up YouTube. It supports local subscriptions, various formats, and even piping media directly into VLC or mpv. It's great!
Must have if you want to avoid google, but still use YouTube

While the app is not perfect and lacks a few features still that would make it ideal, it has consistently worked for me. No ads and no trackers from YT while using this app is brilliant and I would not watch YT any other way.
summary: Serves it function and is simple to use

description: Would be nice if it supported TOR out of the box
summary: Kind of the only game in town

description: Functional, does what it says on the description. Can't have any complaints about free software of this quality and usefulness

My favourite Youtube client, have all the features that I need!

- You can subscribe your favourite channels without the need of a google account
- You can hide the UI in Full window mode or watch in Picture-in-Picture mode
- Lots of customization
- Just perfect, the best of all!
Nice way to watch youtube

Works great, thank you developers

It would be nice if new videos (opened by middle click) were not dependent on the main window and shut down after closing the main window.

This is definately one of the most important applications created in the last few years. Just think how important
youtube is, but unfortunately it's own by an ad company only interested in invading our lives. It's not perfect but because it's a work in progress, it will get better and better for its users. Although I would like to see an easier way to traffic between thumbnails and the video screen, I am very satisfied with its usability. Thank you so much to the developers for liberating us from madness.
This is the best youtube client out there.
One of the best apps! Works even better and faster than the YouTube website!
Not liking it - heavy, not optimized, not properly downlaoding

So so so much laaaaag and api fails. Cant download video with audio like on invidious.

Invidious was a very bad thing to base this app on and is why this is so laggy.

Should be based on Piped so people can actually watch video but the only thing invidious has over piped is 18+ videos are unblocked.

i love the application but unfortunately it crashes on wayland (kde)
i am using kubuntu 22.04

Works flawlessly. It took me a second to figure out how to import my supscriptions, but that is because of google, not a flaw of this application. Lots of nice settings such as default resolution and starting in theater mode by default.

I wish clicking elements to type in would pull
up the on-screen keyboards on shells like phosh
and plasma, other than that complaint, good job
One of the outstanding application or client of YouTube as like NewPipe.

I love the idea of this app but unfortunately the flathub release shows a black screen on Fedora 36. I've messed around with flatpak permissions and can't get it to work - my best guess is it's a wayland problem. If I can fix it I'll give a real review.
This does not work well on the Steam Deck, crashes often.

Amazing features:
- You can import your current subscriptions from YouTube and have them in this app.
- Ad-free experience is great
- Can download video or sound directly from the app
- Does not suggest sponsored content
- Stable, works without issues on Fedora 36

Playing videos seems to work nicely and I do like the overall interface. I had no luck downloading YouTube videos though, which was disappointing . I'm not sure if this issue can be solved. If the app provides a bit of privacy away from Google's prying eyes, I guess that's a plus.

I would have to try out the program a bit more to see if there's any other issues. Overall, I'd say it's a promising addition to the Linux family once these problems can be ironed out.

[I'm using Linux Lite 5.8]
summary: Looks like it's still a bit buggy..

description: safer, more convenient, customisable
The app starts and shows that it is on the subscriptions page, but the window only shows a black or gray screen and never does anything.

A great alternative front-end to YouTube! When NewPipe stops working, FreeTube almost always keeps working. The only issue I have ever found would be that sometimes when switching video quality the data stream errors. Otherwise perfect!
Turn off GPU Acceleration, works on Wayland.
summary: For those having black screen issues

description: Sounds like an exaggeration, but I can barely believe how amazing this is. At a glance it can be slower than YouTube, but considering I no longer have to wait several minutes 1-5 times per video, this is far superior. No clutter, looping, easy screenshot & downloading. If only watching then gaming mode on Steam Deck will suffice, otherwise use it in desktop mode.

The only thing I hate is that the mouse cursor gets tiny and won't follow the system theme properly in Flatpak similar problem that Snaps have. Also when you start it up it loads for too long almost a minute.
summary: Everything is good just one small problem

description: nice app but i prefer firefox

This gem is a must-install for me everytime.
Works with a few hiccups now and then, but generally great.

Nice application that is a little wonky depending on what invidous instance you connect to, not really the apps fault if the server is not working properly though. I block ALL google across my entire network, so this lets me watch youtube videos without allowing google to track me. What a great solution that is improving all the time.
summary: Perfect if you value your privacy and block Google

description: Just perfect, no ads and fully functional
I like this app, especially the UI, better than YouTube itself.

Although it seems supported, I didn't get hardware acceleration by default. To solve the issue, I created a .sh script to launch the flatpak with the necessary flags (see GitHub repo of the project). Modifying the .desktop file did not work, hence why the external script.

Although the videos are downloaded with "avc1" codec (h264) switching to another desktop makes the application pause after some seconds (like if it was buffering) even tho there's plenty of content buffered. The issues solves itself when you go back to the desktop in which Freetube is open.

Finally, stopping/scrolling the video 2/3 times will cause the video to constantly lose frames. The issues does not solve unless you exit completely the video and start the reproduction from scratch.
Discovered this on Steam Deck, using it on Windows desktop as well.
Who needs youtube, now!? Freetube is without any ads, and in superb quality outside of any web browser. Thanks for making this possible!
It's good and works well ..though not showing live section videos from channels at my end.

I've been using this app to keep my attention on the content, and it also allows me to download videos for offline viewing or recording in case the original author deletes them. 

Thanks.
Worst youtube gui i ever used

I absolutely love this app, i use it daily and i never have any need for regular youtube, invidious works fine, its really feature rich, even providing me client-side subscriptions with a subscription feed.

Small issue, its not wayland native, im assuming this has to do with the older electron version, i would love it if they could update to newer electron so they can make it wayland native since xwayland has security issues.

works, but the UI isn't controller / remote friendly. On Steam Deck you can hack the controls to get the job done but it requires using the trackpads to select items rather than letting you cursor through.
summary: Ok, but not a good 10' UI

description:
its good on features but its painfully slow and says this while loading videos or pages:

SyntaxError: Missing catch or finnaly after try

Falling back to Invidious API
Gosto muito, melhor client.
a few bugs sometimes but still great

Its a good app, freetube does what i need it to do, it looks nice, very featureful, although i have 1 issue with it.

I wish it was wayland native, im assuming this is due to the old electron version it is using, i wish they would update the electron version to use one which is wayland native, it would make the experience a whole lot better IMO.

Still not a bad app, i like how private it is, i like the subscriptions feed with everything, its a good app, 9/10 recommend.
summary: Great app, wish it was wayland native

description: Thanks for Youtube without ads and more privacy, Big cred for all involved
neng'iye ere,aki kemaene
This works really good and has become my youtube substitute. Thanks to the devs!

The program doesn't seem to be able to play videos in my preferred lower resolution and instead changes it to the highest available.
Even clicking on the cogwheel didn't resolve this behaviour.
Gefällt mir bis jetzt ganz gut, nur die Kommentare werden oft nicht angezeigt.

Zwar spackt der Video-Player immer ab, wenn ich versuche die Auflösung manuell zu ändern, aber abgesehen davon ist es eine tolle, Datenschutzorientierte Alternative für die Website.

Man kann auch Invidious als api oder sogar kommpletter Video vermittler einstellen, was eine Art "vpn" für Youtube ist. Welcher von vielen Nutzern geteilt wird und es damit so ziemlich unmöglich macht euch zu tracken.
Das einzige was Freetube meiner Meinung nach braucht ist der Feinschliff, aber von den Grundfeatures ist es Perfekt.
Thats my favorite Client for Youtube
The transition has to be made, so it would be great if Freetube will also run on Wayland

Genau so, wie Internet für meinen Geschmack sein sollte. Ohne Reklame, ohne Schnickschnack. Die Funktionen sind übersichtlich angeordnet und selbsterklärend. Das Design hält sich gegenüber dem Bild angenehm zurück. Alle Funktionen halten das, was sie versprechen, super.

Finally i can use YT without an account and without the more and more agressive commercials.

Great application for watching YouTube-Videos without ads. Can't wait for version 0.20.0 to be available as a Flatpak. I would love to be able to use Piped instances for fetching videos though. Still deserves 5+ stars.
La verdad es que es similar a Youtube, lo mejor es que no posee anuncios. También he notado que mi CPU se revoluciona menos con FreeTube que con YouTube.
sin publicidad jejejejeje
Que viva! La comunidad, muy buen trabajo y sin publicidad.
Muy buen funcionamiento. Muchas configuraciones posibles.
Por el momento sin ningún drama, va como piña!

Youtube sans la publicité et son pistage habituel. Tout simplement génial !

(Debian Buster 10)
So far, most similar apps ended up being unreliable. This one is simple, complete and robust. I do recommend.

Great app, working very well, a lot of time and brain space saved by the absence of publicity.

Thanks a ton devs.

je recommande bien évidement.
C'est ce que je cherchais je pense, fonctionel avec plein de reglages, good job.
Excellent pour éviter l'interface de youtube et les pubs
Almost perfect. The only drawback is tabs managment.
it is all good. Got some flickering with wayland. But its maybe not the app's fault.
после обновления на последнию версию 0.21.2 зависла.

Классное приложение! Не смотря на то что нельзя войти под своим аккаунтом, функционал youtube почти не ограничен. Из ограичений нашел пока только то, что нелья лайки ставить и комментарии оставлять. А в остальном все хорошо. Можно подписываться (и даже импортировать подписки из своего аккаунта), добавлять видео в подборки ("избранное" и "смотреть позже" и свои создавать) и т.д. А самое главное - это отсутствие рекоммендаций!
Отлично подходит для серфинга по ютубчику. Единственное НО, нельзя зайти под своим аккаунтом. По крайней мере я не увидел куда ввести данные или по API авторизоваться, а было бы круто это прикрутить.

Эта прога для просмотра ютуба. Со своим аккам в браузере ты не видешь что там есть, тебе пихают подборки, а вот с этой прогой, всё заебись. Считаю что это обезательная вещь. Дабавил в избранное рядом с хромиум, буду пользоватся.
Needs to miniplayer always on top!

Отличная альтернатива ютубу в браузере. Очень удобная система профилей, в которых можно каталогизировать подписки. Можно настроить приложение под себя, изменить масштаб, хотя и на 100% на экране будет отображаться больше видео, чем в браузере.
Единственный минус -- нет отдельной вкладки с рекомендациями. Только с открытым видео можно их увидеть сбоку. Это все еще заставляет заходить на ютуб через браузер.
Ну и выбор качества иногда глючит.

как замена авторизованному Youtube просмотру с "подборками" от Большого Брата и корпорации добра - отличная альтернатива. Мало того, теперь для просмотра Трубы я не пользуюсь браузером совсем. Считаю это приложение не просто ХОРОШИМ, а обязательным для LinuxUser'a.
Авторам: в настройках была бы очень уместна кнопелька "Сохранить конфигурацию"
Спасибо за хорошее приложение. :-))
К установке в обязательно;) Свободасс...
Топич! Спонсорсблок присутствует.
Прекрасно работает на смартфоне Wileyfox Swift с postmarketOS.
